panels.description:
Upstream zuul *gate* queue.  The time a given patch will wait before running the upstream gate.

Click on the links below to go to the zuul build status.
panels.title: Upstream Zuul queue

panels.description:
Number of failing upstream *gate* jobs in the last 24 hours.

Click on links below to go to the source zuul builds status.
panels.title: Upstream gate jobs

panels.description: Percentage of upstream  *gate and check* jobs that are passing vs failing vs timing out.
panels.title: Upstream CI stats

panels.description:
A running list of failing upstream *gate* jobs. By default this will show the last 3 days.

Click on individual jobs to go to the logs or to the gerrit change.

targets.query: SELECT "branch", "change", "log_link", "duration", "cloud", "region", "result" FROM "autogen"."build" WHERE ("passed" = 'False' AND "pipeline" = 'gate' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Upstream failing gate jobs

Click on the links below to go to the softwarefactory-project.io rdoproject.org zuul builds status.

panels.description:
Running list of all upstream jobs including *check* and *gate* queues.

Click on individual job names to go to logs or on the patch number to see the gerrit review.

targets.query: SELECT "branch", "change", "log_link", "duration", "result", "result_num", "pipeline", "voting" FROM "build" WHERE ("result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "job_name" =~ /.*molecule-.*/ OR "job_name" =~ /.tox.*/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "project"

targets.query: SELECT count("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'master' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "name" fill(0)

panels.title: Promotions for CentOS-8 master tripleo ci

targets.query: SELECT count("repo_hash") FROM "dlrn-promotion" WHERE ("release" = 'master' AND "name" = 'current-tripleo-rdo' AND "distro" = 'CentOS-8') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(24h), "name" fill(0)
SELECT max("cpu_time_user") FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" = 'promoter' AND "pattern" = '^python.*dlrnapi_promoter.py .*CentOS-8.*master.*') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Branch ,
  Testname ,
  Result, 
  IF(Result = 'Success', count(Testname) , null) as Passed,
  IF(Result = 'Failure', count(Testname), null) as Failed
  FROM rr_pass_tests
  WHERE Branch = 'master'
group by Testname, Branch;

SELECT
  Branch ,
  Testname ,
  Result, 
  IF(Result = 'Success', count(Testname) , null) as Passed,
  IF(Result = 'Failure', count(Testname), null) as Failed
  FROM rr_pass_tests
  WHERE Branch = 'train'
group by Testname, Branch;

SELECT
  Branch ,
  Testname ,
  Result, 
  IF(Result = 'Success', count(Testname) , null) as Passed,
  IF(Result = 'Failure', count(Testname), null) as Failed
  FROM rr_pass_tests
  WHERE Branch = 'stein'
group by Testname, Branch;

SELECT
  Branch ,
  Testname ,
  Result, 
  IF(Result = 'Success', count(Testname) , null) as Passed,
  IF(Result = 'Failure', count(Testname), null) as Failed
  FROM rr_pass_tests
  WHERE Branch = 'rocky'
group by Testname, Branch;

SELECT
  Branch ,
  Testname ,
  Result, 
  IF(Result = 'Success', count(Testname) , null) as Passed,
  IF(Result = 'Failure', count(Testname), null) as Failed
  FROM rr_pass_tests
  WHERE Branch = 'queens'
group by Testname, Branch;

alert.message: There is more than 1000 ports in DOWN state on RDO cloud. Please check the cleaning script output and situation.
alert.name: Ports in DOWN state alert

panels.description: Ports in DOWN state in RDO cloud, which should be deleted by cleaning scripts.
panels.title: Ports in DOWN state
